thread.title: Major League Baseball suspends Dodgers’ Utley for illegal slide
thread.title_full: Major League Baseball suspends Dodgers’ Utley for illegal slide

title: Major League Baseball suspends Dodgers’ Utley for illegal slide
text:
Major League Baseball suspends Dodgers’ Utley for illegal slide UPDATED 4:46 PM HST Oct 11, 2015 Sean M. Haffey Getty Images Photos Sean M. Haffey Getty Images 
Los Angeles Dodgers second baseman, Chase Utley, will miss two playoff games due to a suspension by Major League Baseball, according to the Associated Press. The suspension comes a day after Utley broke New York Mets’ shortstop Ruben Tejada’s right leg during a hard slide into second base.
